da2e564f-f1de-4b38-b2e3-cb43f30d7a4c.title: simple view angle controller
da2e564f-f1de-4b38-b2e3-cb43f30d7a4c.description:
Connect a logic part to it to turn it on. Use it to control a horizontal bearing and a vertical one. It can move the bearing towards your view direction. 

Press e to change the speed

b42ea95c-1d24-4474-bcc5-c88e1e13c969.title: laser beam generator
b42ea95c-1d24-4474-bcc5-c88e1e13c969.description: Connect a logic part to it to turn it on. It will cast a laser beam, to show the orientations of your creation.
